DETECTIVE_APPLICATION_APPROVED.subject: Application Approved! Welcome to Ask Detectives
DETECTIVE_APPLICATION_APPROVED.body:
Hello {{detectiveName}},

Congratulations! Your application has been approved.

You can now log in and start setting up your profile:

Login: {{loginUrl}}
Dashboard: {{dashboardUrl}}

Next steps:
1. Complete your detective profile
2. Add your services
3. Set your pricing

If you need help, contact us at {{supportEmail}}.

Best regards,
Ask Detectives Team

DETECTIVE_APPLICATION_REJECTED.subject: Application Update — Ask Detectives
DETECTIVE_APPLICATION_REJECTED.body:
Hello {{detectiveName}},

Thank you for your interest in Ask Detectives.

After careful review, we are unable to approve your application at this time.

Reason: {{rejectionReason}}

You may reapply after addressing the concerns mentioned above.

If you have questions, contact us at {{supportEmail}}.

Best regards,
Ask Detectives Team

CLAIMABLE_ACCOUNT_INVITATION.subject: Your Account Has Been Added — Claim It Now
CLAIMABLE_ACCOUNT_INVITATION.body:

Claim your account: {{claimLink}}

This link expires in 48 hours.

After claiming, you will receive your login credentials.

Best regards,
Ask Detectives Team
